creator: arcadius@menelic.com
text:
I am in a situation where we need the ant <get> task to accept arbitrary HTTP headers used for authentication and authorization.

Something like: 

<get src="some source" dest="some dest">
  <header name="h1" value="val1"/>
  <header name="h2" value="val2"/>
</get>


Created a working patch...
Patch will be submitted shortly.

Note that this is similar to issue 24713


This issue has been discussed at 

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/ant-user/201701.mbox/%3CCAJn2xr8Z7iuf2iSNBsS8bZ=pkaEzEC0GGy2gN-hf6258ngUK_Q@mail.gmail.com%3E

- Pull request submitted at https://github.com/apache/ant/pull/31

- Corresponding patch at https://patch-diff.githubusercontent.com/raw/apache/ant/pull/31.patch
creator: arcadius@menelic.com

text: PR merged with git:1ccf1989ac4c780845737fcb6b5e9b7e9664084b on 2017-02-09 for trunk (Ant 1.10.x)
creator: jan@materne.de
